original: 'joms byed nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs //游댷thugs rjes brlan pa'i thugs mnga' ba'i //

analyzed: shin tu rmongs pa'i sems can gyis //

analyzed: glang po che rnams gsod byed ma //

analyzed: lha mo seng ge khros pa yang //

original: phyogs dang nam mkha' ma lus pa'i //
analyzed: phyogs dang nam mkha' ma lus pa'i //

analyzed: du bas khyab cing bzod par dka' //

original: 'bar ba yis ni khro tshig pa //
analyzed: 'bar ba yis ni khro tshig pa //
translated: The blazing one is the wrathful one.游댷

original: khyod bstod char pa me zhir @281b 'gyur ;游댷/ ma rungs gdengs ka las byung ba'i //
analyzed: khyod bstod char pa me zhir @281b 'gyur ; / ma rungs gdengs ka las byung ba'i //

analyzed: sbrul ni lha mo khyod bstod pas /

analyzed: khrag gis yan lag bskus pa ste //

analyzed: rgyal po khros pa'i bran rnams kyis //

analyzed: skra nas bzung nas zhags pa bcings //

analyzed: btson ra spangs nas lha mo kye //

analyzed: khyod la bstod byed 'jigs med 'gyur //

original: dba' rlabs tshogs ni nam mkha' dang // phyogs bcur yang ni khyab byed pa //
analyzed: dba' rlabs tshogs ni nam mkha' dang // phyogs bcur yang ni khyab byed pa //
translated: and the ten directions,

original: gru log na yang rgya mtsho las //
analyzed: gru log na yang rgya mtsho las //
translated: even when the ship is wrecked in the ocean,游댷you throw it far away and reach the other shore.

original: khyod kyis 'phangs nas pha rol phyin / khrag dang glad pa'i 'dam gyis byugs //
analyzed: khyod kyis 'phangs nas pha rol phyin / khrag dang glad pa'i 'dam gyis byugs //

original: de dag bza' ba la chags pa //
analyzed: de dag bza' ba la chags pa //

original: lha mo khyod kyi sngags bzlas pa //
analyzed: lha mo khyod kyi sngags bzlas pa //

analyzed: sha za de dag 'jigs par 'gyur // yan lag chad cing dri ngan pa'i //
translated: Those flesh-eaters will be terrified.游댷With limbs cut off, stinking,

original: khrag dang zhag ni sna la 'dzag /
analyzed: khrag dang zhag ni sna la 'dzag /

original: khyod ni dran pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: khyod ni dran pa tsam gyis ni //

original: mdze can 'dod pa'i lha 'drar 'gyur //
analyzed: mdze can 'dod pa'i lha 'drar 'gyur //

analyzed: bkres skom gyis gdungs gcer bu dang // slong ba'i yi dgas 'gro ba la //

analyzed: khyod la 'dud pa tsam gyis ni //

analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur //

original: 'jigs pa chen po 'jigs med pa //
analyzed: 'jigs pa chen po 'jigs med pa //

analyzed: de ltar dad pas khyod bstod pas // dge ba gang bsags de yis ni //
translated: By praising you with such faith,游댷May they attain the happiness of the world.

original: 'jig rten bde ba can thob shog / rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa slob dpon tsantra go mis mdzad pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten bde ba can thob shog / rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa slob dpon tsantra go mis mdzad pa //
